name: Radiant Seiyaryu
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned from the hand: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it. Cannot be destroyed by battle with a DARK monster, also cannot be destroyed by a DARK monster's effect. Once per turn, at the start of the Damage Step, if this card attacks an opponent's monster: You can banish that opponent's monster until the End Phase, also this card can make a second attack in a row.
